title: Sample Book, 1938
medium: Medium: cardboard binding, celluloid, wool, silk, metallic
description: Book containing samples of fabrics designed by Rodier. White cover with "Rodier" in large red and black celluloid letters. Contains fifteen fashion sketches and fabric samples: 269 wool, 14 silk, 4 wool and metallic, 4 silks and metallic.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, 1938.
1938. Medium: cardboard binding, celluloid, wool, silk, metallic. Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1939-26-2.
